Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Establishes the New York first--shop local program
Summary: Establishes the New York first--shop local program.
LawCode: Amd §100, add Art 5-G §§181-h - 181-o, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the New York first--shop local program
